Live Wetter Feed v1.0.0

A NATS-based microservice that publishes real-time weather readings from simulated sensor stations. Multiple subscribers consume this data for dashboards, alerts, or logs.

Servers

NameProtocolHostDescription
localNATSnatslocalhost:4222Local development NATS server

Channels

NameAddressDescriptionMessages
weather-humidity weather-humidity
  • weatherHumidity
  • weatherHumidityAlert
weather-temperature weather-temperature
  • weatherTemperature
  • weatherTemperatureAlert

Operations

NameActionChannelDescriptionMessages
subscribeToHumidityReadings receive weather-humidity Receives real-time humidity readings and alerts
  • weatherHumidity
  • weatherHumidityAlert
publishHumidityReading send weather-humidity Publishes simulated humidity readings and alerts
  • weatherHumidity
  • weatherHumidityAlert
subscribeToTemperatureReadings receive weather-temperature Receives real-time temperature readings and alerts
  • weatherTemperature
  • weatherTemperatureAlert
publishTemperatureReading send weather-temperature Publishes simulated temperature readings and alerts
  • weatherTemperature
  • weatherTemperatureAlert

Messages

WeatherHumidityAlert

Luftfeuchtigkeitswarnung

Alert for abnormal humidity levels

Content type: application/json

PropertyType
station_idstring
timestampstring
alert_levelstring
messagestring

WeatherTemperature

Temperatur

Real-time Temperature sensor data

Content type: application/json

PropertyType
station_idstring
timestampstring
temperature_cnumber

WeatherTemperatureAlert

Temperaturwarnung

Alert for extreme temperature

Content type: application/json

PropertyType
station_idstring
timestampstring
alert_levelstring
messagestring

WeatherHumidity

Luftfeuchtigkeit

Real-time Humidity sensor data

Content type: application/json

PropertyType
humidity_percentnumber
station_idstring
timestampstring
